{"blocks":[{"key":"7ju2r","text":"Prepare freeze-dryer by pre-cooling and vacuuming to equilibration based on manufacturer’s and lab manager's instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f9nuv","text":"Transfer tubes from -80C to freeze dryer and lyophilize at \u003c-40C and \u003c0.5 mbar overnight.  If a large number of samples will be prepared or if it is easier to keep samples in the racks during freeze-drying, a vacuum desiccator can be added to the freeze-dryer to increase capacity up to 3 full collection tube racks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":90,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ddh8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
